Interface View

All Known Subinterfaces:
AuthenticatedView, PaginatedView
All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicantApplicationWithdrawalView, ApplicantApplyProjectView, ApplicantHomeView, ApplicantReceiptsView, ApplicantReportFilterView, ApplicantReportView, ApplicantViewMyApplicationsFilterView, ApplicantViewMyApplicationsView, ApplicantViewMyEnquiriesView, ApplicationApprovalView, CreateBTOProjectView, EditProjectView, LoginView, ManagedProjectsView, ManagementHomeView, MenuView, MyOfficerRegistrationsView, OfficerRegistrationApprovalView, OfficerRegistrationView, ProfileView, ProjectEnquiryView, ProjectsView, ProjectsViewFiltersView, RegisterProjectsView, RegisterView, RoleBasedHomeView, WithdrawalApprovalView
public interface View
Represents a view, to interface with the BTOSystem. See ViewContext.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    View
    render(ViewContext ctx)
    Renders the interface for the user to access the BTOSystem.

  • Method Details

    • render

      View render(ViewContext ctx)
      Renders the interface for the user to access the BTOSystem.
      Parameters:
      ctx - View context.
      Returns:
      The next view to render.
